title: Support class rework is needed

replies.body: They need to fix the level disadvantage supports inherently get. I dont want to play support because I don't want to  be 4-5 levels behind laners for no reason.

They could fix that actualy with an easy passive to the sightstone:

* Collect exp over time that you consume when placing a ward when out of combat (can only consume an x amount of exp every time)
